tuv.seg: Employment law gives employees various entitlements to leave from work ranging from holidays to parental leave
Employment law gives employees various entitlements to leave from work ranging from holidays to parental leave

Your entitlement to paid sick leave from employment will depend on your contract of employment

Types of leave from work
The law gives an employee a limited right to leave from work in time of family crisis (force majeure)
The law gives an employee a limited right to leave from work in time of family crisis (force majeure)

This gives a list of the nine public holidays and describes employees' entitlement to paid time off for these
Acesta pune la dispoziție o listă cu cele nouă sărbători legale și descrie dreptul angajațiilor la zile libere plătite pentru respectivele sărbători legale
The Parental Leave Act 1998 as amended by the Parental Leave (Amendment) Act 2006 allows parents to take parental leave in respect of certain children
The Parental Leave Act 1998 as amended by the Parental Leave (Amendment) Act 2006 allows parents to take parental leave in respect of certain children
The Carers Leave Act 2001 allows employees to take unpaid time off work to provide full-time care for people that require this care
The Carers Leave Act 2001 allows employees to take unpaid time off work to provide full-time care for people that require this care
All female employees are entitled to maternity leave from work immediately before and after the birth of their child
Toate angajatele au dreptul la concediu de maternitate imediat înainte şi după naşterea copiilor. Află mai multe
People who adopt children may be entitled to leave from employment
People who adopt children may be entitled to leave from employment
This leave is called adoptive leave
This leave is called adoptive leave
